name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench. Lower the bar to your chest, then press it back up. Keep your feet flat on the ground and maintain a slight arch in your lower back.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degrees. Press dumbbells up from chest level, then lower with control. Keep elbows at 45-degree angle to body.

name: Cable Flyes
instructions: Set cables to chest height. Bring handles together in front of chest, then return with control. Keep slight bend in elbows throughout.

name: Push-Ups
instructions: Start in plank position. Lower chest to ground, keeping body straight. Push back up to start. Keep core tight throughout.

name: Dips
instructions: Grip parallel bars. Lower body until arms at 90 degrees, lean slightly forward for chest emphasis. Push back up to start.

name: Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot. Hinge at hips, grip bar, keep back straight. Drive through heels to stand up, then lower with control.

name: Pull-Ups
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip. Pull yourself up until chin clears bar. Lower with control. Keep core engaged.

name: Barbell Row
instructions: Hinge at hips, back flat. Pull bar to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades. Lower with control. Keep core tight.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at machine, grip bar wider than shoulders. Pull bar to upper chest, squeeze lats. Return with control.

name: Seated Cable Row
instructions: Sit at cable machine, feet on platform. Pull handle to lower chest, keep back straight. Return with control.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Straddle bar, hinge at hips. Pull bar to chest, squeeze back. Lower with control. Keep neutral spine.

name: Barbell Squat
instructions: Bar on upper back. Descend until thighs parallel to ground. Drive through heels to stand. Keep chest up, knees tracking over toes.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold bar at hip level. Hinge at hips, lower bar down shins. Feel stretch in hamstrings. Return to standing.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit in machine, feet shoulder-width on platform. Lower until knees at 90 degrees. Press back up, don't lock knees.

name: Walking Lunges
instructions: Step forward, lower until both knees at 90 degrees. Push through front heel to step forward with other leg. Keep torso upright.

name: Leg Curl
instructions: Lie face down on machine. Curl heels toward glutes. Lower with control. Keep hips on pad.

name: Leg Extension
instructions: Sit in machine, ankles under pad. Extend legs until straight. Lower with control. Don't lock knees at top.

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand on edge of step. Rise up on toes as high as possible. Lower heels below step level. Hold something for balance.

name: Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with bar at shoulder height. Press overhead until arms straight. Lower with control. Keep core tight.

name: Lateral Raises
instructions: Hold dumbbells at sides. Raise arms to shoulder height, slight bend in elbows. Lower with control. Don't swing.

name: Face Pulls
instructions: Set cable at face height. Pull rope toward face, spreading handles apart. Squeeze shoulder blades. Return with control.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Start with dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing you. Press up while rotating palms forward. Reverse motion to lower.

name: Front Raises
instructions: Hold dumbbells in front of thighs. Raise arms forward to shoulder height. Lower with control. Keep slight bend in elbows.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand holding bar at hip level. Curl bar to shoulders, keep elbows stationary. Lower with control. Don't swing.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other. Curl up to shoulders. Lower with control. Keep elbows at sides.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: Grip bench behind you. Lower body until arms at 90 degrees. Push back up. Keep elbows close to body.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on bench, arms straight above chest. Lower bar to forehead by bending elbows. Extend back to start.

name: Cable Tricep Pushdown
instructions: Stand at cable machine, grip bar or rope. Push down until arms straight. Return with control. Keep elbows at sides.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Sit at preacher bench, arms extended over pad. Curl weight up to shoulders. Lower with control.

name: Plank
instructions: Hold body in straight line on forearms and toes. Keep core tight, don't let hips sag. Hold for time.

name: Russian Twists
instructions: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly. Rotate torso side to side, touching ground beside hips. Keep core engaged.

name: Cable Crunches
instructions: Kneel facing cable machine, hold rope behind head. Crunch down, pulling with abs. Return with control.

name: Hanging Leg Raises
instructions: Hang from bar. Raise legs until parallel to ground or higher. Lower with control. Keep movement controlled.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Start on knees holding wheel. Roll forward, extending body. Pull back to start with abs. Keep back straight.

name: Running
instructions: Steady-state or interval running. Track distance or time. Maintain good form with relaxed shoulders.

name: Cycling
instructions: Stationary or outdoor cycling. Adjust resistance as needed. Track distance, time, or calories.

name: Rowing Machine
instructions: Drive with legs first, then pull with arms. Return by extending arms, then bending knees. Keep back straight.

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Jump with both feet or alternate. Keep jumps low and controlled. Track time or reps.

name: Burpees
instructions: Drop to push-up position, perform push-up, jump feet to hands, jump up. Repeat for reps or time.
